Asase ne ɛso nneɛma nyinaa ntie,+ wiase+ ne nea ɛwom nyinaa.+2 Yehowa bo afuw aman nyinaa,+ na n’abufuhyew wɔ hɔ ma wɔn asraafodɔm nyinaa.+ Ɔbɛsɛe wɔn, ɔbɛma wɔakum wɔn.+3 Wɔbɛtow wɔn a wɔakunkum wɔn no agu, na wɔn afunu bɛbɔn kankaankan;+ na wɔn mogya bɛhono mmepɔw.+4 Ɔsoro asafo nyinaa bɛporɔw.+ Na wɔbɛbobɔw ɔsoro+ sɛ nhoma mmobɔwee
..........
taa a ɛrehyew.+10 Anadwo oo, anɔpa oo, ɛrennum, na ne wusiw bɛkɔ soro daa.+ Kurow no bɛwo ayɛ kesee wɔ awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu,+ na obiara rentwam wɔ hɔ da.+11 Na pokupoku ne kɔtɔkɔ begye hɔ afa, na patu asotenten ne kwaakwaadabi bɛtena hɔ;+ na ɔde ɔsɛe susuhama+ ne amamfoyɛ prumo bɛto so.12 N’adehye no mu biara nni hɔ a wɔde no bedi hene, na n’abirɛmpɔn nyinaa bɛyera koraa.+13 Nsɔe befifi n’abantenten so, na nsasono ne kokora afifi n’abannennen mu.+ Ɔbɛyɛ sakraman asoɛe+ ne sohori adiwo.+14 Ɛhɔ

Ghana Ghana yɛ kurow bi a ɛwɔ West Africa mantam hɔ. Nkurow a atwa ne ho ahyia no bi ne Côte d’Ivoire (ɛno wɔ atɔe fam), Burkina Faso (ɛno wɔ atifi fam), Togo (ɛno wɔ apue fam) ɛna Gulf of Guinea no wɔ anafo fam. Edin Ghana no kyerɛ “Ɔko mu Hene” na wonyaa saa din no fii tete Ghana empire no mu. Kan no, na ahenni ahorow na woagye Ghana asase no afa paa yiye, te sɛ Ashanti Ahenni, Akwamufo, Bonomanfo, Denkyirafo, Fantefo, ne afoforo a wɔka ho. Ebinom de, na wɔnyɛ Akan fo, te sɛ Ga ne Dagombafo. Wɔne Europafo ntam guadi fii ase bere a wɔne Portugalfo yɛ ntease apam wɔ mfe 1500 mu hɔ. Ɛno akyi no, Britainfo maa nea wɔfrɛ no Gold Coast Ahenni no fii asɛ wɔ afe 1874 mu wɔ Ghana mmeae bi pɛ. Gold Coast no nyaa fahodi wɔ afe 1957 mu fii wɔn sodifo a na wɔne United Kingdom no. ɛno ma Ghana bɛyɛɛ ɔman a edi kan wɔ abibirim ha a enyaa fahodi fii Europafo Nhyɛso ase Nkekaho[sesa] - Government of Ghana Official Website (English) - Parliament of Ghana (English)

NKEKAHO “Ɔkra” ne “Honhom”—Dɛn na Saa Nsɛmfua Yi Kyerɛ Ankasa? SƐ WOTE nsɛmfua “ɔkra” ne “honhom” a, dɛn na ɛba w’adwenem? Nnipa pii gye di sɛ saa nsɛmfua yi kyerɛ biribi a aniwa ntumi nhu a enwu da a ɛhyɛ yɛn mu. Wosusuw sɛ sɛ yewu a, biribi a aniwa ntumi nhu a ɛhyɛ nnipa mu yi fi nipadua no mu, na ɛkɔ so tra ase. Esiane sɛ saa gyidi yi atrɛw kɛse nti, sɛ nnipa pii te sɛ ɛnyɛ Bible nkyerɛkyerɛ a, ɛyɛ wɔn nwonwa. Ɛnde, sɛnea Onyankopɔn Asɛm kyerɛ no, dɛn ne ɔkra, na dɛn ne honhom? SƐNEA WƆDE “ƆK
..........
ɔ a wubehu sɛ wɔka “ɔkra” ho asɛm sɛ “enwu da,” anaasɛ “ɛte hɔ daa.” Mmom no, Kyerɛwnsɛm no ka sɛ ɔkra wu.—Hesekiel 18:4, 20. WƆAHU NEA “HONHOM” NO KYERƐ Afei ma yensusuw sɛnea Bible de asɛmfua “honhom” di dwuma no ho nhwɛ. Ebinom susuw sɛ “honhom” ne “ɔkra” kyerɛ ade koro. Nanso, ɛnte saa. Bible ma emu da hɔ sɛ ɛsono “honhom” ɛnna ɛsono “ɔkra.” Nsonsonoe bɛn na ɛwom? Bible akyerɛwfo no de Hebri asɛmfua ru′ach anaa Hela asɛmfua pneu′ma na edii dwuma bere a na wɔrekyerɛw “honhom” ho asɛm no. Kyer

NEA ƐMA ABUSUA NYA ANIGYE Mmusua a Mmanoma Wom ne Emu Haw MARGARET * TE AUSTRALIA, NA ƆWƆ MMANOMA: “Me kunu yere dedaw no ka kyerɛɛ mmofra no sɛ meka asɛm biara a, mma wonntie; sɛ meka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ wonkotwitwi wɔn se mpo a, mma wonntie.” Ɛyɛ Margaret sɛ saa afotu bɔne no kɔfaa nsɛmnsɛm baa n’aware mu. Afie a mmanoma wom no, wɔne nnipa a wɔnte fie hɔ no nkitahodi tumi yɛ den paa. * Sɛ obi wɔ abanoma a, mpɛn pii no, ebehia sɛ ɔne abofra no maame anaa ne papa ankasa tena ase dwen nneɛma bi ho te sɛ
..........
e no mfa nsiw kwan. (Mateo 7:12) Sɛ wopɛ sɛ mmofra no yɛ biribi saa bere no, na sɛ woyɛ ho hwee a ɛnyɛ yiye a, ɛnde srɛ kwan fi ɔwofo biako no hɔ ansa na woama mmofra no ayɛ. SƆ EYI HWƐ: Bere biara a wobɛsan ahyia wo kora no, yɛ nea edidi so yi: - Tew w’anim ma no. Mmubu no anikyew, na nyɛ biribiara mfa nkyerɛ sɛ ne ho yɛ wo ahi. - Bɔ ne din kyia no. Enti sɛ ɔde Jane a, wubetumi aka sɛ, “Jane, maakye ɛ.” - Sɛ modɔɔso na morebɔ nkɔmmɔ a, munnnyi no mmfi mu. NKITAHODI 2: MMANOMA A WƆANYINYIN Nhoma

MƆƆ MAA ABUSUA NYIA ANYELIELƐ LA Mbusua Mɔɔ Dɔmaba Wɔ Nu MARGARET, * ƐRƐLADANE MƆƆ LƐ DƆMABA NA ƆDE AUSTRALIA LA: “Me hu aye dɛba ne hanle hilele ngakula ne mɔ kɛ bɛmmatie edwɛkɛ biala mɔɔ mebaha la—saa meka kɛ ‘bɛkpuda bɛ gye bɔbɔ a bɛnyɛ.’” Margaret te nganeɛ kɛ zɔhane edwɛkɛ ne a manle ngyegyelɛ rale ye agyalɛ ne anu a. Edwɛkɛ ta ba mbusua mɔɔ dɔmaba wɔ nu nee menli mɔɔ bɛnle sua nu ɛkɛ la avinli. * Saa ɔhyia kɛ bɛkɔkpɔla kakula bie, bɛtea ye na bɛmaa ye ezukoa a ɔwɔ kɛ awovolɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ dɔmab
..........
wɔyɛ la wɔahile ngakula ne mɔ. SƆ ƐHYE NEA: Yɛ ninyɛne ɛhye wɔ kenle fofolɛ mɔɔ ɛ nee ɛ hu aye dɛba anzɛɛ ɛ hu dɛba ne aye kɛyia la: - Nea ɔ nyunlu na sele. Mmakponle anzɛɛ mmato ɛ nye ɛ bɔ nu. - Bɔ ye duma na biza ye ahye. Kɛ neazo la, ka kɛ, “Jane, Ahye o.” - Saa bɛ nwo zonle a bɛlɛdi adwelie a mmaye ye ɛfi nu. Wopɛ sɛ wokenkan saa asɛm yi wɔ %% mu anaa? Yiw Dabi Nhoma ne Nhomawa a Yɛde Sua Bible Nhoma ne nhomawa a ɛwɔ ha yi, fa emu nsɛmti sua Bible; wubetumi atwe bi afi Intanɛt dwumadibea yi so. Twi Ghanafoכ wכ kasa ahoroכ pii. Twi ye kasa ahoroכ no mu baako. Nokware ni, Twi ka Akan kasa abusua a efiri 'Kwa' kasa abusuakuo no ho. Twi gu mu ahoroכ pii, nanso ne nyinaa ye kasa baako a wɔn a wɔka no, obiara te ɔfoforɔ ase. Saa Twi ahoroɔ yi bi ne Asante-Twi, Akuapem-Twi, Akyem, Fante, Bono, Wasa, ene nea ekeka ho. Nnipa bɛye ɔpepepem nson na ɛka Twi kasa wכ Ghana. Twi (anaa Akan) yɛ kasa a wɔka no paa wɔ Ghana. Yei kyerɛ sɛ, nnipa pii no ara na wɔtumi ka Twi kasa no, na dodoɔ no ara no, Twi yɛ wɔn kasakan, mpo ɛwɔ wɔn a wɔnyɛ Akanfoɔ mu mpo.

Atoyerɛnkyɛm Yɛ Asotwe A Ɛfi Onyankopɔn Anaa? Nea Bible ka Atoyerɛnkyɛm a ɛsisi nnɛ no, Bible nkyerɛ sɛ ɛfi Onyankopɔn. Bible ma yɛhu sɛ, nsonsonoe da sɛnea Onyankopɔn bu atɛn ne atoyerɛnkyɛm ntam. Onyankopɔn atemmu de, ɔmfa mfra obiara. Bible ka sɛ: “ Onipa desani hwɛ nea etua aniwa, na Yehowa de, ɔhwɛ komam.” —1 Samuel 16:7. Yehowa hwɛ onipa biara komam, na wɔn a wɔyɛ abɔnefo no nko ara na ɔsɛe wɔn. —Genesis 18:23-32. Onyankopɔn di kan bɔ nnipa kɔkɔ, na ɛma wɔn a wɔpɛ no tie nya nkwa. Atoyerɛnkyɛm nso de, ɛreba a ɛmmɔ nkae. Wobɛhu ara ne sɛ asi akunkum nnipa pa ne nnipa bɔne nyinaa abom. Yɛbɛtumi aka sɛ nnipa ka ho bi na sɛ atoyerɛnkyɛm si a ɛsɛe nneɛma kɛse no, efisɛ nnipa sɛe ara na wɔresɛe asase ne emu nneɛma. Mmeae a atoyerɛnkyɛm taa sisi no nso, nkurɔfo sisi adan wɔ hɔ. Ɛno nti sɛ asasewosow, nsuyiri anaa biribi foforo si a, ɛtumi sɛe ade paa.

Onyankopɔn na Ɔbɔɔ Ɔbonsam Anaa? Nea Bible ka Bible kyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn ammɔ obiara Ɔbonsam, na mmom, ɔbɔɔ ɔbɔfo bi a ɔyɛɛ ne ho Ɔbonsam. Bible ka Onyankopɔn ho asɛm sɛ: “ N’adeyɛ yɛ pɛ, n’akwan nyinaa teɛ. Ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn nokwafo a nkontomposɛm biara nni n’akwan mu, ɔtreneeni a obu atɛntrenee.” (Deuteronomium 32:3-5) Saa asɛm no ma yɛhu sɛ mmere bi, na Satan Ɔbonsam yɛ ɔbɔfo nokwafo a bɔne biara nni ne ho. Enti na ɔka Onyankopɔn mma no ho. Yesu kaa biribi faa Ɔbonsam ho wɔ Yohane 8:44. Ɔkaa sɛ, Ɔbonsam ‘ annyina nokware no mu,’ na ɛno kyerɛ sɛ, mmere bi, na Satan yɛ ɔbɔfo nokwafo a asɛm biara nni ne ho. Nanso sɛnea Onyankopɔn bɔɔ nnipa ne abɔfo no, wɔwɔ hokwan sɛ wɔpaw papa anaa bɔne. Enti saa ɔbɔfo a ɔyɛɛ ne ho Ɔbonsam no, na ɔno nso wɔ saa hokwan no. Bere a Ɔbonsam tew atua tiaa Onyankopɔn na ɔdaadaa awarefo a wɔdi kan no, ɔyɛɛ ne ho Satan a ɛkyerɛ “Ɔsɔretiafo.”

Twi Ghanafoכ wכ kasa ahoroכ pii. Twi ye kasa ahoroכ no mu baako. Nokware ni, Twi ka Akan kasa abusua a efiri 'Kwa' kasa abusuakuo no ho. Twi gu mu ahoroכ pii, nanso ne nyinaa ye kasa baako a wɔn a wɔka no, obiara te ɔfoforɔ ase. Saa Twi ahoroɔ yi bi ne Asante-Twi, Akuapem-Twi, Akyem, Fante, Bono, Wasa, ene nea ekeka ho. Nnipa bɛye ɔpepepem nson na ɛka Twi kasa wכ Ghana. Twi (anaa Akan) yɛ kasa a wɔka no paa wɔ Ghana. Yei kyerɛ sɛ, nnipa pii no ara na wɔtumi ka Twi kasa no, na dodoɔ no ara no, Twi yɛ wɔn kasakan, mpo ɛwɔ wɔn a wɔnyɛ Akanfoɔ mu mpo.

Bible Nsɛmmisa Ho Mmuaeɛ Enti berɛ bi bɛba a wiase nyinaa bɛnya aban baako? Sɛ aban baako na ɛdi wiase nyinaa so a, hwɛ sɛnea anka nnipa bɛnya ahotɔ. Ɛnnɛ ebinom di yie paa, nanso nnipa pii na ohia nti, wɔrehunu amane. Nanso aban a ɛdwene ne manfoɔ ho deɛ, ɛbɛtumi ama obiara nsa aka nea ɔhia. Wohwɛ a nnipa bɛtumi de aban a ɛte saa aba asase so? Ɛfiri tete nyinaa, nnipa aban adi nkoguo. Wɔntumi mmaa wɔn a wɔdi wɔn so no nsa nkaa nea wɔhia; wɔn a wɔn ho taa ka mu paa ne ahiafoɔ. Aban no bi di atir
..........
inaa ananmu. Nea ɔbɛdi saa aban no so no bɛhwɛ ne manfoɔ yie paa. Dɛn na Onyankopɔn Ahennie bɛyɛ? Yehowa Nyankopɔn ayi obi a ɔfata paa sɛ ɔnni wiase so hene. Ne Ba Yesu ne saa Ɔhene no. (Luka 1:31-33) Berɛ a Yesu wɔ asase so no, na ɔtaa boa nkurɔfoɔ. Sɛ ɔbɛdi asase so hene a, ɔbɛka nnipa a wɔfiri aman nyinaa so abom, na ɔbɛyi amanehunu nyinaa afiri wɔn so. Nnipa nyinaa na wɔbɛgye Yesu atom sɛ Ɔhene anaa? Dabi. Nanso, Yehowa wɔ aboterɛ. (2 Petro 3:9) Wama nnipa anya hokwan a wɔde bɛgye Yesu atom

Kofi Annan Wɔwoo Kofi Annan wɔ Kumasi a ɛwɔ Ghana. N'awofo de Victoria ne Reginald Henry Annan. Wɔwoo no ataa na ne nuabea Efua Atta wuu 1991. Ne din Kofi kyerɛ sɛ wɔwoo no Fida. Adehyefie na wɔwoo Kofi Annan esan sɛ na ne wɔfa ne ne nanammarima mmienu no nyinaa yɛ ahenfo. N'agya Owura Henry Annan, a ɔyɛ Asanteni ne Fanteni ba, waree Victoria a ɔyɛ Fanteni. Ɔyɛɛ n'edwuma wɔ Lever Brothers Cocoa Comapany a na ɔyɛ Export Manager. Kofi Annan wɔ mma abien a ɔne Nigeriani Titi Alakija woe ansa wɔntam

Ɔbɔ ye 1909 toonwo mɔɔ ba la bɛ gyima ne ati ne wɔ Brooklyn, New York. Ɔvi ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ kɔ azɛlɛ fofolɛ ne azo la bayɛ kilomita 80 (ma 50). Azɛlɛ fofolɛ ne mɔɔ ye kpole le hɛkta 102 (p. 253) la wɔ dɛba ne sɔlɔ. Alasevolɛ kɛyɛ 800 badɛnla ɛkɛ ayɛ gyima, mɔɔ ɔfese azua, azua mɔɔ bɛyɛ ninyɛne boɛ wɔ nu nee azua mgbole nna mɔɔ bɛba

Gyihova Alasevolɛ ɔfese mɔɔ wɔ maanle gyɛne zo la ɛlɛpelente Baebolo nee Baebolo nwo mbuluku, mɔɔ ɛnee Brooklyn ala a bɛyɛ ye la. Wɔ 2004 anu, bɛyele mbuluku mɔɔ bɛyɛ wɔ United States na bɛava bɛanwa la anwo gyimalilɛ ne bɛhɔle Wallkill, New York. Ɔwɔ Brooklyn sɔlɔ adɔleɛ mɔɔ bɛ avinli tendenle bayɛ kilomita 145 (ma 90) la. BIBLE MU AKORADE | MMEBUSƐM 7-11 “Mma Wo Koma Nnnan” Yehowa mmara bɔ yɛn ho ban. Nanso ɛbɛboa yɛn paa a, gye sɛ ɛda yɛn koma so. (Mme 7:3) Sɛ Yehowa somfo bi anhwɛ yiye na ne koma dan a, ɛbɛma Satan de n’atosɛm ne ne nnaadaa anya no. Sɛ yɛhwɛ Mmebusɛm ti 7 a, ɛka sɛ aberante bi maa ne koma daadaa no. Ɛdɛn na yebetumi asua afi mfomso a odii mu? Satan nam nneɛma nnum a ebetumi atwetwe yɛn akɔnnɔ yi so bɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔbɛma yɛayɛ bɔne atia Yehowa Sɛ yɛwɔ nyansa ne ntease a, ɛbɛboa yɛn ama yɛahu nsunsuanso a bɔne de ba, na ayi yɛn afi biribiara a ɛbɛtete yɛne Onyankopɔn ntam mu

Adɛn Nti na Wɔfrɛ Yesu Onyankopɔn Ba? Nea Bible ka Onyankopɔn nni yere a ɔne no awo mma. Nanso ɔno ne Ɔbɔadeɛ. Biribiara a nkwa wom no, ɔno na ɔbɔe. (Adiyisɛm 4:11) Ɛno nti, Adam a ɔyɛ onipa a Onyankopɔn dii kan bɔɔ no no, wɔfrɛ no “ Onyankopɔn ba.” (Luka 3:38) Afei nso, Bible kyerɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔbɔɔ Yesu. Enti wɔsan frɛ Yesu “ Onyankopɔn Ba.” Onyankopɔn bɔɔ Yesu ansa na ɔrebɔ Adam. Ɔsomafo Paulo kyerɛw Yesu ho asɛm sɛ: “ Ɔno ne Onyankopɔn a wonhu no no suban, abɔde nyinaa mu abakan.” (Kolosefo 1:15) Ansa na wɔrewo Yesu ato mmoa adididaka mu wɔ Betlehem no, na ɔwɔ hɔ dedaadaw. Bible ka sɛ “ n’ase fi tete a enni ano.” (Mika 5:2) Yesu yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔdii kan bɔɔ no. Enti bere a na wɔnnya nwoo Yesu sɛ onipa wɔ asase so no, na ɔyɛ honhom abɔde wɔ soro. Yesu ankasa kae sɛ: “ Mifi soro.” SUA PII ƆWƐN-ABAN Adɛn na Onyankopɔn Somaa Yesu Baa Asase So? Learn why Jesus came to the earth and how we still benefit today.

Onyankopɔn Yɛ Nyame Baasakoro Anaa? Nea Bible ka Asɔre pii kyerɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ Nyame Baasakoro. Nanso Encyclopædia Britannica ka sɛ: “ Asɛm Baasakoro no ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no nyinaa nni Apam Foforo no mu . . . Akyinnyegye bebree kɔɔ so mfe pii, na ɛno na nkakrankakra ɛkɔfaa saa nkyerɛkyerɛ no bae.” Bible nka Onyankopɔn ho asɛm wɔ baabiara sɛ ɔyɛ Nyame Baasakoro. Wo de, hwɛ Bible mu nsɛm ɛdidi so yi: “Yehowa yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ Yehowa koro.” —Deuteronomium 6:4. “Wo a wo din de Yehowa no, wo nko ara ne Ɔsorosoroni, asase nyinaa so.” —Dwom 83:18. “Eyi ne daa nkwa, sɛ [wɔbɛhu] wo, nokware Nyankopɔn koro pɛ no, yiye, ne nea wosomaa no no, Yesu Kristo.” —Yohane 17:3. “Onyankopɔn yɛ obiako.” —Galatifo 3:20. Adɛn nti na Kristofo dodow no ara ka sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ Nyame Baasakoro?

Wopɛ sɛ wokenkan saa asɛm yi wɔ %% mu anaa? YiwDabi Mugye Yesu Di? Aane, yegye Yesu di. Ɔno na ɔkae sɛ: “Mene ɔkwan no ne nokware no ne nkwa. Obiara mma Agya no nkyɛn gye sɛ ɔnam me so.” ( Yohane 14:6) Yegye di sɛ Yesu fi soro baa asase so de ne nkwa a bɔne biara nni ho no bɔɔ afɔre de gyee yɛn. (Mateo 20:28) Ne wu ne ne wusɔre abue kwan ma ɛno nti, nnipa a wogye no di betumi anya daa nkwa. ( Yohane 3:16) Yegye di nso sɛ, seesei Onyankopɔn Ahenni a ɛwɔ soro no, Yesu na ɔyɛ so hene, na ɛrenkyɛ Ahenni no de asomdwoe bɛba asase so baabiara. (Adiyisɛm 11:15) Nanso Yesu kae sɛ: “Agya no yɛ kɛse sen me,” na yegye saa asɛm no di. ( Yohane 14:28) Ɛno nti yɛnsom Yesu, efisɛ yennye nni sɛ ɔno ne ade nyinaa so Tumfoɔ Nyankopɔn.

Obi a wawu ntumi nnwen, ontumi nkeka ne ho, na onni atenka biara. “Dɔte mu na wobɛsan akɔ” Bere a Onyankopɔn ne Adam, onipa a odi kan, no rekasa no, ɔkyerɛɛ baabi a yewu a, yɛkɔ.
